# Begin's I3 Setup

## Accessing the I3 Config

[~/.config/i3/config](status bar)
[~/.config/i3blocks/config](status bar)

bindsym $mod+d			exec --no-startup-id dmenu_run

Where is dmenu run?

begin ~/vimwiki$ which dmenu_run
/usr/local/bin/dmenu_run


Contains the Status Bar: `~/.config/i3/config`
